thread.title: Sidney kennedy

author: Sidney kennedy
title: Sidney kennedy
text: I hate this device in my car it's no different from driving and being on your cell phone when you have to blow in it while you're driving and while you're in the cell phone talking that's the ticket I see no difference I hate this device. It's too hard to blow into for as long as it needs to be blown into need to come up with the better device. It takes too much time to blow into this thing especially when you don't know how to do it.
